address.addressline: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Nicola Shayer in December 2009.

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.repository: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center.
did.abstract: The collection contains correspondence, photographs, speeches, publications and administrative records created and collected by John M. Bailey, Connecticut lawyer and chairman of the National Democratic Party from 1961-1968.

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: John M. Bailey, born in Hartford, Connecticut, on November 23, 1904. Educated at both Catholic University of America and Harvard Law School, Bailey was a lawyer who and municipal judge in Connecticut (1933-1935, 1939-1941). His involvement in the political arena included membership in the Connecticut Democratic State Central Committee (1932) followed by his service as a delegate to Democratic National Convention from Connecticut (1936, 1940, 1944 [alternate], 1948, 1952, 1956, 1960, 1964 [chair, Arrangements Committee], 1968, 1972). Bailey played an important role in Connecticut's Democratic politics and served as the Connecticut Democratic Party Chairman from 1946 until his death in 1975. Bailey worked for John F. Kennedy's successful presidential campaign in 1960 and then went on to serve as chairman of the National Democratic Party from 1961-1968. A member of the American Bar Association, Knights of Columbus and Elks, John M. Bailey died on April 10, 1975, and is buried in Cedar Hill Cemetery, Hartford, Connecticut.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains correspondence, photographs, speeches, publications and administrative records created and collected by John M. Bailey.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: An inventory of the materials has been created to provide access to the materials. The collection is arranged as received.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: For detailed information about this collection please contact the curator or ask at the reference desk.

controlaccess.head: Index Terms
controlaccess.p: This record series is indexed under the following controlled access subject terms.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: There are no access restrictions on this collection.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from these Papers must be obtained in writing from both the University of Connecticut Libraries and the owner(s) of the copyright.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item description, #:#] John M. Bailey Papers. Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was donated by the family in 2007 and 2009.
